item.title: How to change your humidifier canister for Honeywell HM750A1000?
item.description: What is this article about? Article shows you how to change your humidifier canister for Honeywell HM750A1000 Advanced Electrode Steam Humidifier. Why? Before you turn on the heat this fall, they recommend that you change the canister each year. According to the manual, and I quote: “Cylinder light [o] : This yellow LED will illuminate when the humidifier has determined that the cylinder is nearing the end of its life, due to scale accumulation on the electrodes.
